summary: The article titled "MicroProbe: Efficient Reliability Assessment for Foundation Models with Minimal Data" presents a novel approach for evaluating the reliability of foundation models when faced with minimal data availability. title: LastPass 2022 Breach Led to Years-Long Cryptocurrency Thefts, TRM Labs Finds
summary: The 2022 LastPass security breach has been linked to a series of cryptocurrency thefts that spanned several years, according to a report by TRM Labs. Hackers managed to exploit the breach to gain unauthorized access to sensitive data, which they subsequently used to carry out fraudulent activities in the cryptocurrency market.
